fruits.name: Kiwi
fruits.fact: The kiwi fruit is originally from China and was previously called Chinese gooseberry.

fruits.name: Cherry
fruits.fact: The most expensive box of cherries was sold for $35,000 Australian dollars.

fruits.name: Watermelon
fruits.fact: We think of watermelon as a fruit because of its sweet flavor, but watermelon is actually a vegetable. It belongs to the cucurbit family, and is related to pumpkins, cucumbers and squash.

fruits.name: Orange
fruits.fact: As of 2010, Brazil grows one third of all the world's oranges.
